Control Name: 6.1 Establish a process to identify security vulnerabilities, using reputable outside sources for security vulnerability information, and assign a risk ranking (for example, as \u201chigh,\u201d \u201cmedium,\u201d or \u201clow\u201d) to newly discovered security vulnerabilities. \n

control_attributes.Requirement: 6. Develop and maintain secure systems and applications
